SELECT ta.APPROVAL_ID, tt.TASK_NAME, tp.NAME AS project_name, ta.AP_STATUS_ID, te.NAME AS emp_name, ta.CREATE_AT FROM TBL_APPROVAL ta, TBL_TASK tt, TBL_PROJECT tp, TBL_EMP te WHERE ta.TASK_ID = tt.TASK_ID AND tt.PRJ_ID = tp.PRJ_ID AND tt.MANAGER_ID = te.EMP_ID AND ta.APPROVER = #{empId}
ORDER BY ta.APPROVAL_ID desc
